metadata.title: CVE-2018-14048 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
An issue has been found in libpng 1.6.34. It is a SEGV in the function png_free_data in png.c, related to the recommended error handling for png_read_image.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-14048` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpng-tools - 1.6.37-1
libpng16-16 - 1.6.37-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpng1.6 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.37-1').
